subject: Relationships
title: Friendship Is a Health Intervention
description: A quick win: understand Friendship Is a Health Intervention.

hook.text: Loneliness kills more people than obesity. Having close friends is literally a matter of life and death.

buildup.text: A meta-analysis of 148 studies found that strong social ties increase survival odds by 50%.

discovery.text: Friendship lowers blood pressure, reduces inflammation, and strengthens immune function measurably.

twist.text: Doctors rarely prescribe friendship. Yet its health impact rivals quitting smoking or starting exercise.

punchline.text: Close friends increase your survival odds by 50%. Friendship is medicine.
